name: Ocean Desolation
description:
Ocean Desolation is a Free Simple Linear horror game. After falling out of your boat during a thunderstorm you are left stranded in the South Pacific Ocean. Swim your way to different locations and find a way to call for help. But be careful, something lurks at the bottom.

GAMEPLAY

You will have to swim your way to different locations. But make sure to keep an eye out. There could be anything below you.

FEATURES

  • The game will feature a simple swimming system.
  • The game will feature creatures.
  • The game will feature unique sound design.

    PLAY TIME

    20-40 minutes

    ROADMAP

    I'm looking for honest feedback. This will help me improve future games :]
